mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, title, writer,content,uploadfile,re_ref, re_lev, re_seq) values((select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from board),#{title},#{writer},#{content},#{img}, (select nvl(max(seq),0)+1 from board),${re_lev},#{re_seq})
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from board
order by re_ref desc, re_seq ) a) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from board where re_ref=#{re_ref} and seq != re_ref
mapper.update: update board set cnt=cnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
update board set good=good+1 where seq=#{seq}
update board set bad=bad+1 where seq=#{seq}
update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} , uploadfile=#{img} where seq=#{seq}
